Thanks Mike, I think this is what we're looking for.

-----Original Message-----
From: Mike Clark [mailto:mike@...]
Sent: Friday, February 22, 2002 1:36 PM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [junit] multiple assertions


"Hoepner, Josh (J.M.)" wrote:

> Hello all,
>
> I am fairly new to JUnit and I have come across a problem while writing test cases.  I am in a situation where I require one test case to have multiple assertions.  If one of these assertions fails, I still need the others to run.  I'm sure someone else has tried something like this in the past, does anyone have any suggestions?
>

I haven't found the need for this in the past, but you might find the following write-up helpful...

        http://www.gnufoo.org/junit/index.html#failures

Mike
